titles.title: Therefore The Redeemed Of The Lord Shall Return

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return,
And come with singing into Zion,
And everlasting joy shall be upon their heads.
Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return,
And come with singing into Zion,
And everlasting joy shall be upon their heads.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
They shall obtain gladness and joy,
And sorrow and mourning shall flee away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return,
And come with singing unto Zion,
And everlasting joy shall be upon their heads.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
De cierto volveran los redimidos de Jehova,
A Sion cantando, volveran,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Gozo perpetuo sobre sus cabezas habra (2x)
Ellos tendran alegria y gozo,

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Y el llanto y el gemido huiran.
De cierto volveran los redimidos de Jehova,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
A Sion cantando volveran,
Gozo perpetuo sobre sus cabezas habra.
